column2: The Gùn is a moderately fast light OmniMech which was designed by the Capellan Confederation as an Infantry Support 'Mech. Designed with 10 tons of pod space, the default configuration of the Gùn features a combination of anti-infantry and anti-vehicle energy weaponry. The 'Mech also features a Small Cockpit and an XL Gyro. Quirk: Improved Targeting - Short Drop Cost Multiplier: 0.92
column3: The Gùn is a moderately fast light OmniMech which was designed by the Capellan Confederation as an Infantry Support 'Mech. Designed with 10 tons of pod space, the default configuration of the Gùn features a combination of anti-infantry and anti-vehicle energy weaponry. The 'Mech also features a Small Cockpit and an XL Gyro. Склонность: Улучш. наведение - Short Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.02

column2: Garrison Scout
column3: Гарнизонный разведчик

column2: The Gùn is a moderately fast light OmniMech which was designed by the Capellan Confederation as an Infantry Support 'Mech. Rebuilding several 'liberated' chassis from border conflicts was this upgraded with a more formidable engine and Stealth systems to infiltrate deep into capellan Territory.
column3: The Gùn is a moderately fast light OmniMech which was designed by the Capellan Confederation as an Infantry Support 'Mech. Rebuilding several 'liberated' chassis from border conflicts was this upgraded with a more formidable engine and Stealth systems to infiltrate deep into capellan Territory.

column2: Malvina Hazen was part of the group assigned to designing the Jadehawk, while the Khan was a galaxy commander one she shared an especially close bond with Khan Hazen. This mech was her last gift to her brother. Quirk: Distracting Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.23
column3: Malvina Hazen was part of the group assigned to designing the Jadehawk, while the Khan was a galaxy commander one she shared an especially close bond with Khan Hazen. This mech was her last gift to her brother. Склонность: Устрашающий Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.23

column2: Clan BattleMech
column3: Боевой мех кланов

column2: What we have here is something I never thought I would see. It has clan tech, It is built by the clans, but it is definitely designed to rip your face off with those talons. I hope Malvina Hazen gifted you that mech, else you may be in trouble.
column3: What we have here is something I never thought I would see. It has clan tech, It is built by the clans, but it is definitely designed to rip your face off with those talons. I hope Malvina Hazen gifted you that mech, else you may be in trouble.

column2: A custom made adaptation of the JHK-03 ordered by Celina Santos. It replaces the the SRM-6s with an Advanced Tactical Missile System and an LB-X Autocannon/5. It was the first Jade Hawk to become (in)famous in the Inner Sphere. Quirk: Distracting Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.22

column3: Боевой мех кланов

column2: Used by Republic of the Sphere Knight Eve Kincaid during the invasion of Liao in 3134, this Mad Cat III was equipped with an Extended-range PPC and two ER Medium Lasers controlled by a Targeting Computer. The Missile Launchers were downgraded to LRM-10 racks, but augmented with Artemis IV FCS. Quirk: Improved Communications Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.15
column3: Used by Republic of the Sphere Knight Eve Kincaid during the invasion of Liao in 3134, this Mad Cat III was equipped with an Extended-range PPC and two ER Medium Lasers controlled by a Targeting Computer. The Missile Launchers were downgraded to LRM-10 racks, but augmented with Artemis IV FCS. Склонность: Улучш. средства связи Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.15

column3: Ударная единица / Кавалерия

The Missile Launchers were downgraded to LRM-10 racks, but augmented with Artemis IV FCS.

The Missile Launchers were downgraded to LRM-10 racks, but augmented with Artemis IV FCS.

column2: This variant of the Omen was introduced during the Dark Age in 3141. It carries the LB 10-X and AMS of the original design, but only carries one Medium Pulse Laser and one ER Medium Laser. The ATM-12 has been downrated to an ATM-9 with two tons of ammunition, and three heat sinks were removed. With the weight saved by removing these weapons and equipment, engineers added a HarJel III system to each torso. Quirk: Protected Actuators Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.21
column3: This variant of the Omen was introduced during the Dark Age in 3141. It carries the LB 10-X and AMS of the original design, but only carries one Medium Pulse Laser and one ER Medium Laser. The ATM-12 has been downrated to an ATM-9 with two tons of ammunition, and three heat sinks were removed. With the weight saved by removing these weapons and equipment, engineers added a HarJel III system to each torso. Склонность: Закрытые приводы Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.21

column2: This model is produced by both Oriente Weapon Works and Kallon Industries using the latest innovations to move the Rifleman towards a more prominent role again. Compared to its brother design, the RFL-7N2, the RFL-7N focuses more on direct energy weapons over ballistics. This model is produced by both Oriente Weapon Works and Kallon Industries, although not in as great numbers as the -7N2. Quirk: Anti-Air Targeting Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.08
column3: This model is produced by both Oriente Weapon Works and Kallon Industries using the latest innovations to move the Rifleman towards a more prominent role again. Compared to its brother design, the RFL-7N2, the RFL-7N focuses more on direct energy weapons over ballistics. column2: A collaboration between Oriente Weapon Works and Kallon of Talon, the RFL-7N2 carries two LB/X 10 Autocannons, 2 Light PPCs and 2 ER Medium Lasers. To fit the weaponry the 'Mech uses a 240 XL engin, but does come with CASE II to protect the volatile ammunition bins. Quirk: Anti-Air Targeting Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.08

column2: The Rifleman C 3 are completely constructed from scratch, unlike the Rifleman C retrofit of the RFL-3N, which pair integrated cutting-edge technology with classic styling. With its dual Ultra AC5 and twin Extended-Range Large Lasers main armament, the C 3 is perfect for garrisoning duties. The combination of Ferro-Fibrous armor with CASE II and Endo Steel structure also allows adding two Extended-Range Medium Lasers for close range protection and a total of 14 heatsinks. Quirk: Anti-Air Targeting Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.14
column3: The Rifleman C 3 are completely constructed from scratch, unlike the Rifleman C retrofit of the RFL-3N, which pair integrated cutting-edge technology with classic styling. With its dual Ultra AC5 and twin Extended-Range Large Lasers main armament, the C 3 is perfect for garrisoning duties. The combination of Ferro-Fibrous armor with CASE II and Endo Steel structure also allows adding two Extended-Range Medium Lasers for close range protection and a total of 14 heatsinks. Склонность: ПВО Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.14

column2: With the success of the latest generation of Mad Cats and Vultures, it’s only logical that other beloved OmniMechs get their due. column2: With only a pair of Thunderbolt-5 launchers and a retractable blade for weapons, “Aladdin” isn’t a flashy fighter. Dubbed the Ryoken III, this beast seems an odd choice for the Wolves over one of their homegrown designs, and suggests a possible Snow Raven link. Quirk: Stable Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.06

column2: With only a pair of Thunderbolt-5 launchers and a retractable blade for weapons, “Aladdin” isn’t a flashy fighter. Its Angel ECM and stealth armor give it the ability to hide in built up terrain, and thus surprise strikes are its best hope. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.02
column3: With only a pair of Thunderbolt-5 launchers and a retractable blade for weapons, “Aladdin” isn’t a flashy fighter. Its Angel ECM and stealth armor give it the ability to hide in built up terrain, and thus surprise strikes are its best hope. Склонность: Узкий / Низкий профиль Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.02

column2: Using space savings of the XL Engine and strength of its endo-steel construction, the Warwolf is able to carry 30 tons worth of Omni pod weapons and equipment. Quirk: Improved Targeting - Medium Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.12
column3: Using space savings of the XL Engine and strength of its endo-steel construction, the Warwolf is able to carry 30 tons worth of Omni pod weapons and equipment. Склонность: Улучш. наведение - Medium Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.12

column2: The Pollux ADA Heavy Tank was a dedicated anti-aircraft artillery vehicle designed to serve as a component of the Terran Hegemony's planetary defense forces. Armed with a Sniper Artillery Piece and a LB 10-X Autocannon, the Pollux carried 3 tons of ammunition for each weapon.A turret mounted Medium Laser and forward facing Small Pulse Laser gave the tank some token means of close-in self-defense. Also protecting the tank is 6 tons of Ferro-Fibrous armor giving its hull modest strength ward off light attacks as its escorts take out would be attackers. Powering the vehicle is a GM 225-rated standard Fusion Engine, giving the vehicle modest speeds to keep with typical vehicle formation and heavy 'Mechs Tracked: High traction, agile turning. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 3/5 Hex: 90/150 Meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 170 40 Left 132 40 Right 132 40 Rear 116 40 Turret 165 40 Total 715 200

column2: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
column3: Это танк, что ещё сказать. Как по мне, они все выглядят одинаково.
